# Ghost Touch Armor (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Ectomancy Spells|ectomancy]]]

**Level:** Bone Collector 2, [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a shield made of resin)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Armor of creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 102
